caption.p: Regressed surface heat fluxes averaged over the Arctic (north of 70N) on the −SIE09hp for each month. ( a– d) Are downward longwave radiation (RL ↓), downward shortwave radiation (RS ↓), net shortwave radiation (RS net), and latent plus sensible heat fluxes (LH + SH), respectively. The heat fluxes are defined positive downward in ( a– c), but positive upward in ( d).
